channel.title: Teleblock timer

item.title: Teleblock timer
item.dc:creator: @slick slick
item.description:
@slick wrote:

hi all lol im coding my own server and it gets a lil messy sometimes, so yea but anyway i setup the teleblock feature for emotes, teles, command teles, etc but now lol when ur tbed on my server, ur tbed so good that u had die, then log in order to be able to teleport lol any help to etheir set a timer and/or allow u2 tele after died without logging? any help plz? idk how much code to post so if u want to see a specific part let me know and ill post it asap[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 04, 2009, 08:12:41 pm[/size][hr]ok this is getting a bit fustraitingâ€¦ ive been waiting and no1 even cared to really look at my topic so im posting my void for teleblock maybe some1 will look now

public void Teleblock()
{
teleblock = true;
sendMessage("A teleblock has been cast on you!");
stillgfx(345, absY, absX);
}

maybe thats y its so small, missing the timer or w/e[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 04, 2009, 08:25:03 pm[/size][hr]got it half working now, just need to get timer, i set it teleport = false; when u die : )

Read full topic
